Trade/Device Name(s): cobas® Influenza A/B & RSV Nucleic acid test for use on the cobas® Liat® System
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Real Time Nucleic Acid Amplification System
Specimen Container(s): cobas® Influenza A/B & RSV assay tube
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for cobas Influenza A/B & RSV nucleic acid test using real-time RT-PCR on the cobas Liat System for rapid qualitative detection of respiratory viruses
Indications for Use Summary: Automated multiplex real-time RT-PCR assay for rapid qualitative detection and discrimination of Influenza A, Influenza B, and RSV RNA in nasopharyngeal swab specimens from symptomatic patients, as an aid in differential diagnosis in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological risk factors; not intended to detect Influenza C
